com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class XMLData2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.XMLData2

  • public class XMLData2
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides basic functionality to parse XML data
    Author:
    Sebastian Staudt
